BBModBaseBrush2D.name: BBModBaseBrush2D
BBModBaseBrush2D.description: Base 2D brush class extended by BBModImageBrush2D, BBModLineBrush2D, etc...

BBModImageBrush2D.name: BBModImageBrush2D
BBModImageBrush2D.description: A 2D brush module for drawing images in a stamp-like style.

BBModLineBrush2D.name: BBModLineBrush2D
BBModLineBrush2D.description: A 2D brush module for drawing contiguous lines in a stamp-like style.

BBModBaseBrush2D.name: BBModBaseBrush2D
BBModBaseBrush2D.description:
Base 2D brush class extended by BBModImageBrush2D, BBModLineBrush2D,
etc...

params.name: config
params.description:
An optional config hash to initialize any of
BBModBaseBrush2D's public properties

example: var baseBrush = new BBModBaseBrush2D({ width: 100, height: 100, color: new BBModColor(255, 0, 0) });

BBModImageBrush2D.name: BBModImageBrush2D
BBModImageBrush2D.description: A brush module for drawing images in a stamp-like style.

params.name: config
params.description:
A optional config hash to initialize any of
BBModImageBrush2D's public properties.

example: var imageBrush = new BBModImageBrush2D({ width: 100, height: 100, src: "http://some/image.png" });

BBModLineBrush2D.name: BBModLineBrush2D
BBModLineBrush2D.description:
A 2D brush module for drawing contiguous lines in a stamp-like style.
What makes BBModLineBrush2D fundamentally different from BBModBaseBrush
is that each new drawing instance is influenced by the last position of
the brush (usually to adjust for drawing angle or brush width).

params.name: config
params.description:
A optional config hash to initialize any of
BBModLineBrush2D's public properties.

example: var lineBrush = new BBModLineBrush2D({ width: 100, height: 100, variant: "soft" });

classitems.description: The brush's x position.
classitems.name: x

classitems.description: The brush's y position.
classitems.name: y

classitems.description: The brush's width.
classitems.name: w

classitems.description: The brush's height.
classitems.name: height

classitems.description: The brush's rotation. This property is not always used with each brush variant.
classitems.name: rotation

classitems.description: The brush's color.
classitems.name: color

classitems.description:
Wether or not to draw the brush to the screen. Toggle this variable
to hide and show the brush.
classitems.name: hidden

classitems.description:
The type of brush. Defaults to "base" for BBModBaseBrush, "image" for
BBModImageBrush, etc... and should be treated as read-only.
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: Base update method. Usually called once per animation frame.
classitems.name: update

params.name: controllerModule
params.description:
An object with x and y properties and
optionally an isDown boolean (used for beginning and ending
strokeds/marks). )

classitems.description: Base draw method. Usually called once per animation frame.
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Multiplies width and height properties by amount.
classitems.name: scale

params.name: amount
params.description: Amount to scale width and height by

classitems.description: The type of brush. This property should be treated as read-only.
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: The current brush variant.
classitems.name: variant

classitems.description: The internal image element used to load and draw to screen.
classitems.name: _image

classitems.description:
An internal variable to check if the variant has been changed since
the last update().
classitems.name: _lastVariant

classitems.description: A private method used by src's getters and setters.
classitems.name: _src

classitems.description:
An array of all supported variants. For the BBModImageBrush2D class
these are a list of pre-made SVGs with programmatic control for
changing their color.
classitems.name: variants

classitems.description:
The brush's image src. Functionally equivalent to the src property of an
Image element. When src is not null no variants are used (i.e. the
variant property is set to null).
classitems.name: src

classitems.description: Update method. Usually called once per animation frame.
classitems.name: update

params.name: controllerModule
params.description:
An object with x and y properties and
optionally an isDown boolean (used for beginning and ending
strokeds/marks). )

classitems.description: Draws the brush to the context. Usually called once per animation frame.
classitems.name: draw

params.name: context
params.description:
The HTML5 canvas context you would like to draw
to.

classitems.description:
The brush's previous x position. This property is unique to
BBModLineBrush.
classitems.name: prevX

classitems.description:
The brush's previous y position. This property is unique to
BBModLineBrush.
classitems.name: prevY

classitems.description: The type of brush. This property should be treated as read-only.
classitems.name: type

classitems.description: The current brush variant.
classitems.name: variant

classitems.description: The brush's line weight.
classitems.name: weight

classitems.description: An array of all supported variants.
classitems.name: variants

classitems.description:
Keeps track of wether or not the controllerModule passed into update
was made active (for instance if it was pressed) this frame.
classitems.name: variants
